nodes.text: This robe once belonged to the Cathar Jedi Sylvar, a fellow student of future Dark Lord of the Sith Exar Kun. Though her mate, Crado, fell under Kun's sway and into darkness, she remained true to the light and became a strong voice within the Jedi Order. Her robe provided some protection against energy as well as the dark side, in addition to providing increased mobility.
These robes were possibly found by the Jedi Exile some time in 3951 BBY, during the First Jedi Purge.
In the game, only a character whose alignment is light-sided can wear the robe.
